questions.question: Which of the following statements is TRUE about the Kerberos protocol?

answers.b: It is vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks.
answers.c: It requires the use of public key cryptography
answers.d: It uses a ticket-based system for authentication and authorization.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a component of the Kerberos protocol?
In Kerberos, the client sends a to the key distribution centre to access a certain resource.
